item.description: I'm organizing an all-vegan bbq at The Park at East Rock for Sunday, May 23rd from 1-6 pm. It's a pot luck; i'll be taking care of all the "meat" stuff and grilling (plus vegan lasagna/mac and cheese, salad and some baked goods so we have all the bases covered) the rest is up to fate! anyway i thought i'd extend the invite here to anyone who's interested - it's free! there will also be a stuff swap (bring any unwanted items you're looking to get rid of and a plastic bag to take new treasures home in) and possibly basketball, frizbee and soccer for anyone interested. Let me know! the event is public through my facebook account. thanks! :)

group.name: The New Haven Vegan Meetup Group

item.name: VEGFEST NEW HAVEN 2010
